metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter apologizing for not writing because of his studies. He is on holiday for the Angola Fair and says that he has been guided by God to the right place. He has decided to study Sanitary Engineering in the Civil Engineering Department and is also taking English. He lives in a private house, likes the area and finds the pure air and daily walks good for his health.
